_comment: Manual overrides for publications. Fields: slug (required), pdf_url, video_url, code_url, custom_title, custom_venue, abstract, featured (boolean), custom_order (number - higher floats to top).
_instructions: The slug should match part of the publication title (used for matching). Add entries here to provide additional links, custom abstracts, featured status, or custom ordering.

overrides.abstract: This is a custom abstract that will be shown instead of the scraped one. It supports basic HTML for formatting.
